Note on Expected Sample Size Reduction

Source: R/matching.R
ess_footnote_text.Rd

Note on Expected Sample Size Reduction

Usage

ess_footnote_text(width = 0.9 * getOption("width"))

Arguments

width

Number of characters to break string into new lines (\n).

Value

A character string
